Related Character(s): 喬

穚字的基本解释

穚
jiāo
禾长。
禾吐穗开花。
莠草茂盛的样子。

穚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》舉喬切，平宵，見。］
(1)禾吐穗开花。
(2)禾长。
(3)莠草繁盛貌。

穚字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穚； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页860第25
【廣韻】舉喬切【集韻】【韻會】居妖切【正韻】堅堯切，?音驕。禾秀也。　又莠草長茂貌。　又通作驕。【詩·齊風】維莠驕驕。　亦通作喬。【揚子·法言】田甫田者莠喬喬。

穚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
穚字的起名意思

禾长。禾吐穗开花。莠草茂盛的样子。

Basic explanation of words
穚
jiāo
Wo long.
He spit ears bloom.
The grass looks lush.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāo］
["Guangyun" cite Qiaoqie, Ping Xiao, see you. ]
(1) He Tusui blooms.
(2) He long.
(3) Weeds are prosperous.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　穚; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 860-25
[Guang Yun] Ju Qiao Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ju Yao Qi [Zheng Yun] strong Yao Qi, sound arrogant. He Xiu also.　The grass grows luxuriantly again.　Also arrogant. 【Poetry·Qi Feng】Weihu arrogant.　Also pass as Joe. 【Yangtze·Fayan】Tian Futian who is Qiaoqiao.
